Uses of Class
com.adobe.platform.operation.auth.Credentials

  • Packages that use Credentials 
    Package Description
    com.adobe.platform.operation
    Contains the classes and sub-packages for various operations.
    com.adobe.platform.operation.auth
    Contains the classes for all types of credentials supported by DC Services SDK.

    • Uses of Credentials in com.adobe.platform.operation

      Methods in com.adobe.platform.operation with parameters of type Credentials 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static ExecutionContext ExecutionContext.create​(Credentials credentials)
      Creates a context instance using the provided Credentials.
      static ExecutionContext ExecutionContext.create​(Credentials credentials, ClientConfig clientConfig)
      Creates a context instance using the provided Credentials and ClientConfig

    • Uses of Credentials in com.adobe.platform.operation.auth

      Subclasses of Credentials in com.adobe.platform.operation.auth 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  ServiceAccountCredentials
      Service Account credentials allow your application to call DC Services on behalf of the application itself, or on behalf of an enterprise organization.
